scripts.flutter:install: bash -c 'if [ ! -d "$HOME/flutter" ]; then git clone https://github.com/flutter/flutter.git "$HOME/flutter"; fi'
scripts.flutter:build: bash -c 'export PATH="$PATH:$HOME/flutter/bin"; flutter build web --web-renderer canvaskit --release --pwa-strategy offline-first'
scripts.build: npm run flutter:install && npm run flutter:config && npm run flutter:pub-get && npm run flutter:build
